fact_check_explanation_title: Evidence doesn’t show 400,000 people have long Covid ‘right now’
fact_check_explanation_summary: Layla Moran’s claim about people who suffer symptoms for 12 weeks or more is not accurately calculated.

fact_check_explanation_title: A Bangladesh study doesn’t show that depression follows Covid-19
fact_check_explanation_summary: The Telegraph misreported a scientific study which found that many former Covid-19 sufferers had depression, but did not say whether the virus was to blame.

fact_check_explanation_title: Covid vaccine hasn't caused increase in care home deaths
fact_check_explanation_summary: The vaccination programme started at around the same time as the recent wave of Covid-19 deaths.

fact_check_explanation_title: Study doesn’t say most vapers are 17% more likely to transmit Covid
fact_check_explanation_summary: The research actually found a lower risk of transmission from vaping than from talking or coughing.

fact_check_explanation_title: Covid-19 survival rate is not 99.991% for under 60s
fact_check_explanation_summary: A widely shared video on Facebook makes incorrect claims about coronavirus death data.

fact_check_explanation_title: Labour’s figures on the cladding crisis are far too high
fact_check_explanation_summary: The real number of people who might be financially affected by new fire regulations may be about a tenth of Labour’s claim.

fact_check_explanation_title: Evidence doesn’t show 20,000 people ‘sick with Covid’ fail to self-isolate every day
fact_check_explanation_summary: Jonathan Ashworth’s claim is a misunderstanding of figures used by Test and Trace boss Dido Harding.
An Instagram post claims the Covid-19 death toll up to week 47 of 2020 is 30,000 lower than it actually is.

fact_check_explanation_title: Some people have died after Covid-19 vaccination—not because of it
fact_check_explanation_summary: When a death is reported on the US VAERS system, it does not mean it was caused by the Covid vaccine

fact_check_explanation_title: Ipsos MORI isn’t trying to kill you with Covid tests
fact_check_explanation_summary: A viral video on social media warns people against taking part in Ipsos MORI Covid testing studies.

fact_check_explanation_title: People giving Covid-19 vaccines won’t be tried as war criminals
fact_check_explanation_summary: A video claims the roll-out is part of an experiment where the subjects haven’t consented, which is wrong.

fact_check_explanation_title: No evidence that nanoparticles in Covid-19 vaccines affect fertility
fact_check_explanation_summary: Nanoparticles are the general term for very small particles.
